Henry Martens

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Henry Martin
  2. Foster Name:
  3. Foster Family: Shadales
  4. Location of Family: Madison, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Madison, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 9
  8. Date of Birth: 1898-07-01
  9. Date of Death: 1948-01-24
  10. Gender: male
  11. Notes: Later lived with J.R. Mourer, in Spencer, NE with biological sister Alma.
  12. Source: Madison Star-Mail, 22 November 1908.
